Employee severance and benefit costs | $16.0 | $16.3 | $56.8

Total restructuring and related charges (1) | $25.9 | $36.9 | $160.4

paragraph 1: Restructuring and Related Charges
paragraph 2: Following is a summary of our restructuring and related charges:
paragraph 3: (1) Includes $21.5 million, $16.3 million and $51.3 million recorded in the EMS segment, $2.6 million, $16.6 million and $82.4 million recorded in the DMS segment and $1.8 million, $4.0 million and $26.7 million of non-allocated charges for the fiscal years ended August 31, 2019, 2018 and 2017, respectively. Except for asset write-off costs, all restructuring and related charges are cash settled.
paragraph 4: (2) Fiscal year ended August 31, 2017, includes expenses related to the 2017 and 2013 Restructuring Plans.
